name: elong

stmt.origin: elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, con0, word(c0), word(cv(hs0)))
stmt.pretty: elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, con0, Ord(c0), Ord(hs0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, con0), word(c0)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(word(cv(hs0)), word(c0)))
-| wceq(con0, cab(hs0, word(cv(hs0))))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsw(hs0, word(c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ On ↔ Ord(c0)))
⊣ (hs0 = c0 →(Ord(hs0)↔ Ord(c0)))
⊣ On = { hs0 | Ord(hs0)}
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, Ord(c0))

-| diffsw(hs0, word(c0))
